title: This Week In Tech: Silca’s Tariff-Limited Electronic Pump, Strava’s Strike on Fake KOMs, and Smart Kids Bikes
content:
Priority crowdsources its latest bike design, Universal Colours adds more... colors, and more this week in tech.
